amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to carry out the Rural Energy for America Program.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 799 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 799 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6808-6809; text: CR S6809) To prohibit the use of funds to carry out the Rural Energy for America Program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 799 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738.
